about.title: About us
about.subtitle: Estate Agency was founded by professionals who are at the origins of the Bulgarian real estate market. Originally a reliable company, which adheres to the best pricing policy for its clients.
about.main: The main principles of our work:
about.submain: Offer quality service to our clients | Provide a wide range of attractive properties | Help the customer understand all the variety | Offer everything at attractive prices
about.foot: Our vision is to be the most trusted and respected real Estate Agency in Plovdiv

service.title: Services
service.list: Examination of documents for the real estate property presented by the client for sale | Execution and registration of civil contracts with real estate | Consulting on questions related to the real estate market | Assisting in selling the property | Search for a potential buyer for the client's real estate | Assistance in real estate sale and purchase transactions | Mediation services for renting the real estate | Organization of a viewing (showing) of the real estate object | Registration of the ownership of the land | Registration of the transfer of title | Advertising support

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.foot: Thanks to you we are becoming better!
